mapper.sql: id, permission_name, permission_name_english, permission_description, permission_description_english, permission_type, permission_action, parent_id, create_time, modified_time
mapper.select: select id, permission_name, permission_name_english, permission_description, permission_description_english from permission
select id from permission where permission_description like '%数据查看%'
mapper.insert: insert into permission (id, permission_name, permission_name_english, permission_description, permission_description_english, permission_type, permission_action, parent_id, create_time, modified_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionNameEnglish,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionDescriptionEnglish,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{permissionAction,jdbcType=BIT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
